Race.SpecificTitle: Road District B -- 3.92 Mills Continuation - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District B of Webster Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of three and ninety-two hundredths (3.92) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $414,600 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of building, constructing, maintaining and repairing roads and bridges in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Sarepta Fire Protection District No. 5 -- 12 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Sarepta Fire Protection District No. 5 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Sarepta Fire Protection District No. 5 of the Parish of Webster, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a twelve (12) mills tax (the "Tax") on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $143,844 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities and equipment in the District, including paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?
